channel.title: Login Screen
channel.description: So I just recently downloaded a 518 server called Deathlypvpz and the releaser Hack3r put in the coding to where at the log in screen it automatically puts in his username and password. I tried working on this last night but i tried to search for his info but non of it is in the source or the client. i even tried looking in the Cache. Can anyone point me in the right direction?

item.title: Login Screen

item.description:

okay im looking at the saveuser.ini but it doesnt have anything to do with hack3r and his password. How do I delete that
